name: Dynamite Soccer 2000
overview: This late entry into the PlayStation's soccer lineup focuses on the series' typical values such as the feeling of manual control and player freedom, while adding new dribbling mechanics, tuned balance and Japanese player/stadium data for 2004. Dynamite Soccer 2000 is the second game in the series for the Playstation One console. The game features: - Different competition: Friendly, Cup, League & World Cup. - Different game modes: Training, Match & Penalty Kick match. The training modes includes: - corner kick training, free kick training and penalty kicks training.
